employeeId.description: The unique identifier for the employee.

name.description: The full name of the employee.

firstName.description: The first name of the employee.

middleName.description: The middle name of the employee, if any.

lastName.description: The last name of the employee.

email.description: The work email address of the employee.

dateOfJoin.description: The date the employee joined the organization.

leavingDate.description: The date the employee left the organization, if applicable.

originalHireDate.description: The original hire date of the employee, if applicable.

leftorg.description: Indicates whether the employee has left the organization.

lastModified.description: The timestamp of the last modification to the employee's record.

status.description: The status of the employee (e.g., active, inactive).

probationPeriod.description: The probation period of the employee in days.

personalEmail.description: The primary personal email address of the employee.

personalEmail2.description: The secondary personal email address of the employee, if any.

personalEmail3.description: The tertiary personal email address of the employee, if any.

mobile.description: The mobile phone number of the employee.

relevantExperience.description: The relevant experience of the employee in years.

title.description: The title or position of the employee.

yearsInJob.description: The number of years the employee has been in their current job.

yearsInService.description: The number of years the employee has been in service.

prevExperience.description: The employee's previous experience in years.
